document.discussion_title: Media Advisory: Fountain Tire Rolling Into Grande Prairie for Drive-In Movie Event
document.topic_text: GRANDE PRAIRIE, ALBERTA–(Marketwired – Aug. 9, 2016) – WHAT: In appreciation of the loyalty and support its customers have given over the last 60 years, Fountain Tire is celebrating its 60 th Anniversary by hosting a free, family-friendly drive-in movie night in Grande Prairie on August 21, 2016. Along with the Open Road Cinema Tour, Fountain Tire locations will celebrate with 60 days of in-store promotions, AIR MILES contests giving away a total of 60,000 AIR MILES, and many other local events. The Open Road Cinema Tour is a drive-in movie event, where family members of all ages can enjoy a free, full-length blockbuster film. Family friendly activities and games will be onsite for pre-show entertainment. A&W Grande Prairie/Clairmont will be onsite providing hamburgers and A&W Root Beer by donation to the MS Society of Canada. Attendees are recommended to register in advance of the Open Road Cinema Tour at http://www.fountaintire60.com/ . For more information about Fountain Tire and its 60 th Anniversary, please visit http://www.fountaintire.com/ . WHEN: Sunday, August 21, 2016 Pre-show entertainment and activities: 6:15 p.m. Anticipated start time of movie: 9:30 p.m. WHERE: Evergreen Park 55051 Township Road 710 County of Grande Prairie About Fountain Tire Established in 1956, Fountain Tire is one of Canada’s premier tire and automotive service retail networks with 160 locations spanning Central and Western Canada from the Vaughan, north of Toronto to Victoria, British Columbia. The company is also a leading provider of tires and tire-related services to commercial truck fleets and off-road vehicles used in the agriculture, oil and gas, mining, and construction sectors. The majority of Fountain Tire managers own equity in their store. This partnership-based business model combines community invested store management with corporate intelligence to provide customers with service they can trust. The company’s shared ownership business model has enabled it to be named among Canada’s “Best Managed Companies” every year since 1994. Contact Information: Leanna Kruk 403-390-2170 lkruk@brooklinepr.com Automotive , General News .
